###
### Disable "Lootsplosion" Mayhem 2.0 Modifier
### by Apocalyptech
###
### As the title says, makes it so 'Lootsplosion' will never show up
### as an Easy Mayhem 2.0 modifier.  In the end, I'm just not fond of
### the amount of extraneous loot that ends up littering the area,so out this goes.
###

### https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

### Generated by gen_disable_lootsplosion.txt
###
